com.logituit.logixsdk.ads

Interface LogixAdEventListener


  • public interface LogixAdEventListener
    Events listener for the events occuring on the ads

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

        void onAdError(com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3.api.AdErrorEvent adErrorEvent)
        This method is called when an error is occured while the ad is playing
        Parameters:
        adErrorEvent - A AdErrorEvent

      • onAllAdsCompleted

        void onAllAdsCompleted(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when all ads managed by the current ads manager have finished playing.

      • onAdCompleted

        void onAdCompleted(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when an ad completes playing.

      • onAdCuePointsChanged

        void onAdCuePointsChanged(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when VOD stream cuepoints have changed.

      • onAdContentPauseRequested

        void onAdContentPauseRequested(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when content should be paused. This usually happens right before an ad is about to hide the content.

      • onAdContentResumeRequested

        void onAdContentResumeRequested(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when content should be resumed. This usually happens when an ad finishes or collapses.

      • onAdFirstQuartile

        void onAdFirstQuartile(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when the ad playhead crosses first quartile.

      • onAdLog

        void onAdLog(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired to enable the SDK to communicate a message to be logged, which is stored in adData. This can be fired when a VPAID ad sends a LOG message, or in the event of a non-fatal playback error (e.g. an ad in a pod cannot be played). Here, adData has the following properties:
        Parameters:
        adEvent - * - type: the type of error. * - errorCode: the error code. * - errorMessage: the error message. * - innerError: detailed information about the error, if applicable; will be absent otherwise.

      • onAdBreakReady

        void onAdBreakReady(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when an ad break is ready from VMAP or ad rule ads. This will only fire if autoPlayAdBreaks has been set to false in ImaSdkSettings. If autoPlayAdBreaks is true, ads will play without firing this event. Here, adData has the following property:
        Parameters:
        adEvent - * - adBreakTime: the time at which the ad break occurred. 0 for pre-rolls, -1 for post-rolls. For mid-rolls, content playhead time, in seconds.

      • onAdMidpoint

        void onAdMidpoint(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when the ad playhead crosses midpoint.

      • onAdPaused

        void onAdPaused(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when an ad is paused.

      • onAdResumed

        void onAdResumed(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when an ad is resumed.

      • onAdSkippableStateChanged

        void onAdSkippableStateChanged(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when an ad changes its skippable state.

      • onAdSkipped

        void onAdSkipped(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when an ad was skipped.

      • onAdStarted

        void onAdStarted(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when an ad starts playing.

      • onAdTapped

        void onAdTapped(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when a non-clickthrough portion of a video ad is clicked.

      • onAdIconTapped

        void onAdIconTapped(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when an icon is tapped.

      • onAdThirdQuartile

        void onAdThirdQuartile(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when the ad playhead crosses third quartile.

      • onAdLoaded

        void onAdLoaded(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when the VAST response has been received.

      • onAdProgress

        void onAdProgress(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired to inform of ad progress and can be used by publisher to display a countdown timer.

      • onAdBuffering

        void onAdBuffering(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when playback stalls while the ad buffers.

      • onAdBreakStarted

        void onAdBreakStarted(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when an ad break in a stream starts. Communicated to the publisher via player APIs.

      • onAdBreakEnded

        void onAdBreakEnded(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when an ad break in a stream ends. Communicated to the publisher via player APIs.

      • onAdPeriodStarted

        void onAdPeriodStarted(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when an ad period in a stream starts. Communicated to the publisher via player APIs. This includes the entire ad break including slate as well. This event will be fired even for ads that are being replayed or when seeking to the middle of an ad break.

      • onAdPeriodEnded

        void onAdPeriodEnded(LogixAdEvent adEvent)
        Fired when an ad period in a stream ends. Communicated to the publisher via player APIs.
